channel.title: Projects on PeterEvansDS
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on PeterEvansDS

item.title: Writing a Maintainable ML Pipeline
item.description:
After working on some sizeable projects, I realised that I needed to improve my coding skills in terms of following best practices.

The days of messy code scattered around a disorganised Jupyter notebook are gone after what I have learned on this project!

item.title: Dating App Clustering
item.description: As part of my recently completed Masters, I undertook the challenge of clustering a set of dating app profiles, using both structured and text data.

item.title: PySpark Regression
item.description: The problem with using standard Python data science libraries like NumPy and Pandas is that they operate in the main memory of the system. This can become a problem when the datasets start getting large, as is common with the advent of big data.

item.title: Sarcastic Headlines
item.description: NLP classification model built to determine whether a headline is sarcastic or not, with an EDA conducted using Tableau.

item.title: Airline Satisfaction Clustering and Classification
item.description:
A group project for the Applied Techniques of Data Mining and Machine Learning module of my current Masters. We were tasked with undertaking an extensive data mining project in pairs, including a literature review and business problem evaluation.

My partner and I chose to perform both clustering and classification tasks on a dataset of airline satisfaction results, following the CRISP-DM data science framework.

item.title: Salary Classification
item.description: Model to predict whether someone receives a salary of over 50k using their characteristics listed in the census, built using the dataset from the UCI Machine Learning Repository.

item.title: Web Scraping Used Car Sales
item.description: Built a used car dataset by scraping the most recently listed vehicles on theaa.com, utilising BeautifulSoup and Requests Python libraries.

item.title: Medical Insurance Regression
item.description: A project to build an estimation model capable of accurately predicting a patient’s medical expenses based upon their basic characteristics of age, sex, BMI etc.
